posts.title: Asenso News Iligan City
posts.description: NATIONAL ICT MONTH, GIBUKSAN Opisyal ng gibuksan ang kasaulogan sa  National  Information Communication Technology o ICT Month diin miduyog ang Lokal nga Kagamhanan sa Iligan pinanguluhan  sa Information Communication  Technology Center. Adunay 19 ka mga aktibidad nga alang sa tibook bulan nga selebrasyon. Diin  apil niini ang himoong Proficiency Exam alang sa mga ICT Professional, Cyber Security, Digital Literacy, Digital trainings ug uban pa. Ang selebrasyon  sa ICâ€¦

posts.poster: Center for Digital Iligan, Innovation & Sustainability
posts.title: Center for Digital Iligan, Innovation & Sustainability
posts.description: The National ICT Month Celebration in Iligan City officially commenced through a kickoff ceremony led by Mayor Frederick Siao, Chairman of the Iligan ICT Council, and the Department of Information and Communications Technology (DICT). With the national theme â€œWalang Iwanan sa Digital Bayanihan,â€ this yearâ€™s celebration focuses on inclusive and collaborative digital transformationâ€”ensuring that all communities benefit from digital innovation. In his message highlight, Mr. Paul Hui, Executive Director of the Iligan ICT Council, City Consultant on Innovation Governance and head of the Center for Digital Iligan, Innovation & Sustainability (CDIIS), emphasized the cityâ€™s commitment to building industry-aligned digital ecosystems. Throughout June, the city will host various activities aligned with its Digital Cities Program, including digital skills training, innovation forums, and technology showcasesâ€”driven by the collaborative efforts of LGU Iligan, DICT, DTI, academe, and the private sector. #DigitalBayanihan #NICTM2025 #ICTMonth2025

title: Introduction to Vibe Coding: Building with AI
description: The Digital Creatives Hub â€“ Iligan hosted Introduction to Vibe Coding: Building with AI â€” a beginner-friendly session that welcomed participants into the world of AI-assisted development.

posts.title: Digital Creatives Hub Iligan
posts.description: ğ—§ğ—µğ—² ğ—œğ—»ğ˜ğ—¿ğ—¼ğ—±ğ˜‚ğ—°ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—» ğ˜ğ—¼ ğ—©ğ—¶ğ—¯ğ—² ğ—–ğ—¼ğ—±ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ—§ğ—¼ğ—¼ğ—¸ ğ—¢ğ—³ğ—³ ğ—®ğ˜ ğ˜ğ—µğ—² ğ——ğ—¶ğ—´ğ—¶ğ˜ğ—®ğ—¹ ğ—–ğ—¿ğ—²ğ—®ğ˜ğ—¶ğ˜ƒğ—²ğ˜€ ğ—›ğ˜‚ğ—¯ The Digital Creatives Hub â€“ Iligan hosted Introduction to Vibe Coding: Building with AI â€” a beginner-friendly session that welcomed participants into the world of AI-assisted development. Led by Mr. Alexander Burias, AI Consultant at Daloy Tech OPC and CTO/CEO of Tag Sing Co., the session explored how tools like Gemini and bolt.new allow users to create a landing page for a website using just natural language prompts â€” no coding experience needed. As part of the activity, participants were able to build their own landing pages by giving specific prompts, gaining hands-on experience in using AI to generate layouts and design structures. This session served as an introductory training, sparking interest for deeper workshops that will cover how to make websites work â€” including button functionality, page linking, and interactive components. Organized by DEVCON Iligan through the DEVCON Kids Program, the event is part of ICT Month 2025, in partnership with the City Government of Iligan under Mayor Frederick Siao, DICT Iligan, the ICTC Department, and the Center for Digital Iligan, Innovation & Sustainability (CDIIS).

title: Open House and Exploring Gadgets
description: Join us for an open house at the Digital Creatives Hub! Explore the latest gadgets, technologies, and creative tools available to the community.

title: ICT Proficiency Exam
description: Test your ICT knowledge and skills in the ICT Proficiency Exam. Earn a certification and boost your professional credentials.

title: 3D Modeling and 3D Printing Crash Course
description: A crash course on 3D modeling and printing. Learn to create your own 3D models and bring them to life with our 3D printers.

title: School in a Bag
location: Kalamalahan Elementary School,Brgy. Rogongon, Iligan City
description: An outreach program to bring digital education to remote areas. The 'School in a Bag' provides a portable classroom with digital tools for students.

title: DCIH Creatives Cowork Space and MSMEs Virtual Office Space Briefing
description: A briefing on the new Creatives Cowork Space and Virtual Office Space for MSMEs at the Digital Creatives Hub Iligan. Learn about the amenities and how to join.

title: Smart Systems for Digital Transformation
description: An online webinar discussing the role of smart systems in driving digital transformation across various industries. Learn from experts and see case studies.

title: National ICT Month 2025 Culminating Activity
location: ICGEU Coop Hostel 2nd Floor Buhanginan Hills, Palao City, Iligan City
description: Join us for the culminating activity of the National ICT Month 2025. A celebration of a month-long series of events, with awarding ceremonies and special presentations.

title: DEVCON Kids Robotics Tournament
description: Watch young innovators showcase their skills in the DEVCON Kids Robotics Tournament. A fun and exciting competition for future engineers and programmers.

title: Digital Tourism and Community-Based Digital Nomad Tourism FGD
description: A Focus Group Discussion on Digital Tourism and Community-Based Digital Nomad Tourism. Share your insights on how to promote Iligan as a destination for digital nomads.

title: Iligan Freelancers Meetup
description: A meetup for freelancers in Iligan to network, share experiences, and learn from each other. A great opportunity to connect with the local freelance community.
